title: 14 DAY BAN
body:
Game 1
Hotyounglad: UR A %%%GOT
Hotyounglad: What were you doing
Hotyounglad: are you retraded
Hotyounglad: lol
Hotyounglad: you were dead when i showed up
Hotyounglad: was trying to stp you guys from running it down
Hotyounglad: it cannot be helped if you just kys

Did someone to tell me why i got a 14 day ban. Is league seriously this big of a safe space that calling someone a %%%got once will get you banned.

replies.body:
%%%got is a highly homophobic slurword. Would grant a 14 day ban.
Calling others retarded, hatespeech, would grant a 14 day ban (maybe not if alone).
Telling someone to end their life, would grant a 14 day ban. 
There you go 3 reasons.

actually read were i said kys i was talking about the game

the context for the kys is in game he is running straight at the other team and dying.
Hmm. ok. Well that doesn't really absolve you of the rest of your logs.
yup I guess we should just talk passive aggressively at each other and never say it directly

Or you could just do neither, and actually act like a functional adult. The only way to win is not fighting.

Or you could realize that in 20-30 min you will never interact with these people ever again so flaming them will literally achieve nothing but getting banned. Maybe just be the adult in the room, when a child starts crying on a plane you don't yell at the kid to shut the fuck up, you suck it up and deal with it.

George Carlin used to say that context matters.

He's also dead, so there's that.

I was going to look over the first offense as a joke. But then you insisted on using more poor choice of words. You gave me no other choice. I gladly looked over the team mistakes we made, though. I misread what you were doing, running to you thinking you were diving on an enemy. But that wasn't the case. I had no ill thoughts towards it, though. We still won.

Just think about the words you're using, next time.

Not a safe place.  It's a place where they have rules.  Rules that you agreed to when you signed the TOU.  Maybe actually read through those next time.  https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse

Essentially, treat the people in game like they are actually humans, because they are.  People don't stop being people just because you are connected via wifi.
